articles.title: UK's largest oxygen supplier asks vets and rugby clubs to return gas for NHS - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: BOC, the UK's largest oxygen supplier, has asked non-essential customers to return their tanks of oxygen to help NHS shortages
articles.content:
Across the country, small businesses say that their oxygen supplies have been requisitioned by BOC in an effort to plug potential supply gaps.
Cross Keys RFC, a rugby union club in Wales, said it had returned all of its oxygen supplies, as did a dentist in F… [+1566 chars]

articles.content:
